text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Leaves an Oil tile under it after exploding. Spawns uncommonly. Drops Blazing Plant Food
$(br)$(#bd951a)Oily Olive originates from far within the Mediterranean and has come to this mysterious land to study culinary techniques.

pages.title: ‚è≥ Contain Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Leaves Oil behind and their Blazing Plant Food makes combustive plants.
